Name: Ankur Mahajan
Reviews: This place is like an oasis in a desert. Pleasant ambience. hygienically fit. Has a clean washroom...something rare in this city. Menu is limited but food is decent and very reasonably priced. Service is nice and quick. Staff is interested ‚Ä¶MoreThis place is like an oasis in a desert. Pleasant ambience. hygienically fit. Has a clean washroom...something rare in this city. Menu is limited but food is decent and very reasonably priced. Service is nice and quick. Staff is interested in serving which is important. Quality of food and presentation is above average which is very good for kharagpur. Uploading menu pics so you can pick and choose. Enjoy
